Package characters

    Class Description
    Blinky
    This class describes Blinky, a member of Ghost.
    Character
    This class describes a Character object, which represents movable objects in the Pacman game.

    This class describes Clyde, a member of Ghost.
    Ghost
    This class describes Ghost characters as well as methods pertaining to their actions in the Pacman game

    This class describes Inky, a member of Ghost.
    Pacman
    This class describes a Pacman character, which is a player-controlled Character object in the Pacman game.
